thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 69 of 625
thread.title: Linda Kenesie

author: Linda Kenesie
title: Linda Kenesie
text: I received my first order in less than a week. The salar capri is my favorite so far. Perfect fit and fun colors. I have just ordered black salar leggings and the Almeria outfit with the green tank and a black Teresa tank. I am so happy to say goodbye to my oversized sweats and tee shirts. (My husband is too). I'm ready to add fashion and fit to my workouts and my casual wardrobe. Great prices and quality for my budget.
